name: Cost Plus Drugs
description: Access affordable medication pricing and comprehensive drug information from Cost Plus Drugs pharmacy. Search medications, browse categories, and get transparent pricing for prescription drugs.
author: David Osher

tools.name: search_medicines
tools.description: Search for medications by exact name (generic or brand name). Returns detailed medication information including pricing, forms, and availability.

tools.name: get_collections
tools.description: Browse and discover medication categories/collections. Get collection IDs needed for filtering medications by category.

tools.name: get_all_products
tools.description: Retrieve medications with filtering by category and pagination. Always sorted alphabetically by name (A-Z).
